titleStmt.title: J. S. Billups et al. to Thomas E. Bramlette
CWG12020

availability.p: This image and transcription is publicly accessible. The image appears courtesy of the repository named in the Source Description. The transcription and annotation were undertaken by Kentucky Historical Society staff, volunteers, and interns. If referencing this document title, accession number, and permanent URL.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

msIdentifier.collection: 37th - 76th Regiments Enrolled Militia Primary Source Documents (1861-1866)

body.p: To his Excelancy Gov Thomas E Bram

Govenor of Kentucky your Petiton Citizans of Lawrence County and of The Enrold Malatia of Said County would Respectfully ask your Excelancy To Order an Election for Colonel and Liutenant Col of of the Malitia at the Enseuing August Election that we may have a Fare chance at the Polls to Select Some Good Loyal man that will not Favor Rebels in place of Loyal men as we no this has ben the case all we ask is to Gave us a Chance at the Ballot Box
